content:
Softball question here:
I am populating Encounter.Location.physicalType [with the v2 PV1.03 elements], and I want to know. Do I populate the Referenced Location.physicalType with the same value? Is it recommended to populate both exactly the same? What's the purpose for having it in both places? I can image some search use cases to have it in both places, but it does seem redundant.
